subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Andrew Olson had 21 points, 10 rebounds and 10 assists to help Amherst, the defending champion, beat Ursinus, 84-58, in a Division III basketball semifinal in Salem, Va. Fletcher Walters finished with 18 points and 8 rebounds for Amherst (27-3). The Lord Jeffs will face Washington-St. Louis (24-6), which beat Hope by 89-74, for the championship Saturday.
